page.title: 15Manager:Rowntree-Mackintosh
page.content: Changes at the workplace-an interview with Mr.Roger Cordia:factory manager at Rowntree-Mackintosh by Morag Stuart and Crispian Baker of Bootham School, July 1985. {Did you have any connection with {Rowntrees before getting a job with {them? I have been here since I was 22,i.e. 20 years,to begin with in PERSONNEL, TRANSPORT and DISTRIBUTION. Then I came back to York to become a factory manager. {What does being a factory manager {involve and what working hours are {required? This site has two functions.(1)It is a factory.(2)Separate functions like Management Division and Administrative HQ,Transport and distribution. I start work at 8.30am and go home around 6pm. continued on page 16.
